Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2017 02:21AM Sr2295 wrote: thanks for all of the good wishes! I am home and feeling pretty good following my surgery. One night in hospital. I'm awaiting pathology report. That's apparently going to take a few more days. I was given a bra at the hospital. I agree that post surgical nausea was pretty awful. Fortunately, I had spoken to anesthesia folks in advance and they had a few options waiting for me. Arm stiffness and pain is worse than any chest discomfort. I'll post again soon. Glad to be home before the predicted snow storm. Luck to anyone with upcoming surgery!
